normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1Bonus_Ste:
* ...You want to know what
  I think about your...
  friend?

* That is a weird
  request... but alright.

* What can I even say that
  hasn't been said before?

* The brilliance of Loomi
  Neus can still be felt
  to this day.

* Her hopes and dreams
  outshone the world
  itself.

* Heh... you can even say
  that she still shines
  through you and me.

* It is her power that
  we're both borrowing,
  after all.

* Do you remember that
  kind flower lady?

* The thing I found back
  then... what she used
  to make my mantle.

* She called it the
  fragment of a Shadow
  Crystal.

* Your sister wouldn't
  happen to know anything
  about that... would she?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_5:
* What are you talking
  about, Susie?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_6:
* That spotlight might
  have turned on by
  itself...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_7:
* But there's no Shadowguy
  in it.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_9:
* Yeah... but that's
  clearly not Kris's
  shadow either.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_1:
* At least one of you has any
  brains.

* Heh. Nice try sneaking
  up on us.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_2:
* To you and the fluffy
  one...

* I'm just the big boss of
  the Midnight Crew.

* Respect my authority,
  and we'll be on good
  terms.

* Let's just say that
  after I'm done with
  them...

* They'll have a face even
  a mother can't love.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_3:
* This wimp thinks they
  can even get close to us
  before I clobber them!

* Couldn't hear a word
  over your begging for
  mercy.

* That IS what you're
  doing, right?

* (How was I supposed to
  know that they could do
  that!?)

* Well, if you're not
  going to repeat your
  begging...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_4:
* My men will end this
  quickly and efficiently.

* Any last words} Want a
  final meal, perhaps?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3Kreid1_Step_0_5:
* What are you doing here,
  Chairiel?

* Very well@ You will get
  away scot-free this time.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_98:
* This isn't your house
  for sure.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_108:
* Is this a dream or
  something??
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_138:
* But if this isn't a
  dream, then who opened
  one in your house?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_147:
* It's definitely not you
  or me, but that means...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_165:
* Dammit, that Knight guy
  must have snuck in...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_182:
* And opened this Dark
  World while we were
  sleeping.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_207:
* ...I guess we should
  start heading towards
  the fountain.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R1_Step_0_216:
* And kick the Knight's
  ass for making us save
  the world THREE times!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_19:
* You gotta wonder who
  makes all these...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_27:
* And why they're set on
  wasting our time when we
  have a fountain to seal.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_35:
* Would be a major help if
  Ralsei was with us.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_43:
* Your mom isn't here
  either, so she must be
  lost as hell nearby.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_51:
* ... Damn@ We should
  probably find her before
  things get out of hand.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_59:
* She can't be THAT far
  ahead, right?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_88:
* You see any way to
  solve this?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_110:
* Do they think we're
  idiots or something??
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_120:
* That's more suspicious
  than that one time...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_129:
* When all the
  marshmallows from QC's
  disappeared.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_190:
* H-hey, don't look at
  me like that!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_232:
* I was just checking
  if the food wasn't
  an uh...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_250:
* Yeah@ Turns out it's
  just some plastic.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_259:
* Here, I even left you a
  piece.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_269:
* Susie hands you a "real"
  turkey drumstick.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_286:
* ...It has a unique taste of
  artificiality and friendship.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_294:
* Almost like the real
  stuff, right?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_335:
* Oh. There's a me-shaped
  hole here.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_358:
* Don't tell anyone about
  this, ever.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_381:
* Despite all her rage, she's
  just a lizard outside a cage.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R2_Step_0_390:
* ...or a fool outside a cage,
  according to the sign.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R3_Step_0_49:
* I knew this felt too
  familiar!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_55:
* Looks like we'll have to
  kick more asses than
  just the Knight's.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_81:
* Nothing we can't handle,
  right Kris?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_91:
H: Yuh're on our turf, lads@ Yuh
   with me?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_100:
H: Yuh get on de turf yuh get de
   uh...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_108:
H: Jerry, what violent ting
   rhymes wit' turf?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_133:
H: De point is dat yuh're gonna
   appear on milk cartons, lads@
   Capeesh?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_142:
H: Kreid and the Midnight Crew
   send der regards, beheheh!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_224:
* Getting to you without
  becoming like Lancer's
  room was difficult.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_234:
* Full of music players
  with only splat noises??
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R5_Step_0_258: H: Dey got two of ours already!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_14:
* ...The Darkners earlier
  mentioned some sort of
  "Midnight Crew".
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_24:
* So, um, what do you
  think that group is
  about?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_34:
* They're probably just
  the mafia around here.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_55:
* You know, the crime
  people from all those
  movies.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_65:
* The jazz, guns, big city
  accent, some mysterious
  big boss with a cigar?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_74:
* They called their boss
  "Cried" or something
  like that.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_95:
* What do you think
  they're like, Susie?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_106:
* Like I said, probably
  your average crime boss.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_116:
* ...I'm not sure what you
  mean by that exactly.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_126:
* Huh} Ralsei, you've
  never seen a mafia movie
  before??
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_147:
* I haven't actually seen
  any movie before...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_156:
* So, no sleepovers or
  movie nights, too?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_168:
* Damn, you've missed out
  on a ton...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_210:
* Well, we COULD have one
  in Castle Town after
  this.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_221:
* We just need to find a
  working TV and find
  some movies somewhere.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_230:
* Should have a lot around
  here, right?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_239:
* You... you would do that
  for me?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_261:
* The last one me and Kris
  had was crashed by a
  Dark Fountain, heh...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_289:
* I could make us some
  snacks...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_297:
* We could also organize
  it in my room I just
  renovated...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R6_Step_0_325:
* You guys will LOSE IT
  watching the horror
  movies.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_19:
* Indeed@ I've never
  seen a Dark World like
  this before.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_28:
* Hey, what's wrong with
  the fountain?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_37:
* It looks kinda... hard,
  compared to the last
  two.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_54:
* We've arrived at a very
  unfortunate time.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_63:
* When the darkness of
  night covers the Light
  World,
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_71:
* Dark Fountains emit
  considerably more
  Darkness.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_87:
* The usually liquid
  Fountains get covered in
  solid Darkness...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_115:
* Wouldn't the Roaring
  just happen no matter
  what we do now??
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_135:
* When the light of day
  strikes the Light World,
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_152:
* Then and only then will
  Kris be able to seal it.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_160:
* ...So we have to survive
  a whole night here, huh?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_169:
* Damn, this is just like
  Five Nights At ICE-E's
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_220:
* It's been quite a while, hasn't
  it!?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_234:
* I'm back... and I'm not going
  anywhere!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_266:
* That's right{ Our show is
  coming back!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_273:
* And this time it'll be better
  than ever before!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_308:
* Now, now... I know some of you
  hold grudges against them.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_315:
* BUT they're a crucial part of
  today's show!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_323:
* And I don't let anyone
  interrupt my shows.
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_342:
* Anyway, anticipate the WORLD
  PREMIERE... NOW!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_356:
* EVERY SINGLE ONE OF YOU is a
  part of today's program!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_363:
* So don't sit around like pipis
  and go get 'em, tigers!
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_397:
* I've got a bad feeling
  about this World
  Premiere...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3R7_Step_0_416:
* A game show instead of
  a world domination
  obsessed robot...?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3_spacechannel1_:
* Ugh... can't you give
  me some peace?

* Hey h_y hey la__es, gentlemen,
  and uni______ __eatures{ It's
  us!

* It's been __ite a w__le, hasn't
  it, Mike?

* We apo_____e for the long w__t,
  but a lot of ____ges were made
  beh___ _he scenes.

* We had to say g__dbye to one
  of our prev____ stars...
* But t_e show m___ g_ on!

* We'll k__p bringing you th_
  __rills you love, and d__'t
  worry...

* The two of us a__n't g_ing
  any__ere!

* ugh... can't you give me some
  peace?
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3_spacechannel2_:
* ENTERTAIN ME. I'M SO BORED,
  MEW!

* WHY DO YOU LIKE COMING HERE}
  THERE'S NOTHING.

* exactly, nobody comes here@
  i can just sit without any
  worries...

* ...that is, except for when
  you talktalktalktalktalktalk
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3_spacechannel3_:
* very funny, but you tried
  that joke already.

* feighline, i wish you would
  shut upupupupupup
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3_spacechannel4_: * Kris...?

* is it really
  youyouyouyouyouyou?
* it doesn't matter, does it?

* you shouldn't be here@ find
  your friends and gogogogogogo

* enjoy the spotlight@ it never
  lasts...

* DON'T MIND HER, KRIS. SHE'S
  SUCH A DOWNER.
* COME SIT BY ME, MEW!
* SHE'S SO MEAN TO ME, KRIS...

* NEVER SCRATCHING ME ON THE
  CHIN... NEVER BUYING ME HATS...
* YOU'RE NOT LIKE HER, THOUGH!
* the stars...
* aren't they beautiful, Kris?

* peaceful and lonely in the
  uncaring emptiness around them.

* free of any
  stringsstringsstringsstrings

* sometimes, when i sit here
  watching them, i wonder what it
  would be like.

* could you imagine being a star,
  surrounded by so much
  spacespacespacespacespacespace?

* no one can control a star@ it
  floats blissfully in the sky
  until the end of time...

* isn't it ironic} we called
  ourselves stars while being the
  biggest fools of allallallall

* i thought i could find the
  light, but here i am now: a
  husk of my former self.

* sitting here for hours, staring
  wistfully at what i tried to
  chase...

* unable to bring myself to care
  about anything, or do anything
  else...

* ...what would even be the
  point?

* none of us can get close, no
  matter how hard we
  trytrytrytrytrytry
* what do you think, Kris?

* you don't need to lie to me,
  Kri
* You aren't lying?
* i find that hard to believe.
* You will... show me?

* i really don't think you
  cancancancancancan
* very well.

* if you truly mean it, then I
  will humor youyouyouyouyouyou
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3_spacechannel5_:
* ...i see@ in case we meet
  again...
normal_gml_Object_oTextC3_spacechannel6_:
* it's been so long, but her
  words still echo in my head...

* to think it all started with
  herherherherherher

* she could pull strings better
  than anyone.

* if she wasn't trapped in my
  brother's fake body, she could
  have figured it all out...

* i wish i could see her again...
  just once.

* if there was even a slim
  chance she had the answer...
normal_gml_Object_oTextCinematic_Step_0_: Yet, who will shoulder the burden?
normal_gml_Object_oTextDadTalk_Step_0_6:
* Oh... my little Susie@
  Why are you crying?
normal_gml_Object_oTextDadTalk_Step_0_13:
* ...They're back at it again@
  I see.
normal_gml_Object_oTextDadTalk_Step_0_27:
* Being different from others
  doesn't make you worse than
  the rest, you know?
normal_gml_Object_oTextDadTalk_Step_0_34:
* You're not a curse, you're
  a gift.
normal_gml_Object_oTextDadTalk_Step_0_41:
* Don't forget, true
  strength   LIES IN DISCOVERY THROUGH EXPERIENCE INSTEAD OF DATAMINING
normal_gml_Object_oTextGameOverC3_Step_0:
Come on, 
that all you got!?
normal_gml_Object_oTextShadowWomanBackup:
* Buy a drink first...
  then we'll talk.

* Especially... from
  the likes of you.

* You're not from
  around here... are
  you?

* I'm whatever the Midnight... needs
  me to be.
* Not much else to say... to you.
* They got me... out of a bad spot.

* Now I help Kreid... and the
  others...

* Control this... part of the Dark
  World.

* Plans to take over the rest are...
  in the works.

* I would advise you to... not get
  on bad terms with us.

* Dwelling on the past... with you,
  cyan.

* There's few that Kreid... respects
  as much.

* And even fewer... they hold that
  dearly, like a mother.

* To take control over the
  Midnight... from someone like
  that...

* I wish Kreid talked it out... with
  us.

* Don't tell Kreid I said that,
  capeesh?
* I'd rather... keep my pay high.
* You and the Boss have history...
* Did you... no longer like them?
* This time will be no different.

* You have the whole Midnight's
  attention... cyan.

* I built it from the ground up...
  with nothing but simple planks.
* My dream was always having a bar.

* Every month... started bringing
  less and less profit.

* I was... at the brink of
  bankruptcy.

* Kreid saw potential in me... and
  my bar.

* Financial aid... for joining the
  Midnight.
* The money was nice... and helpful.

* I also... gained something more
  valuable that day.

* For the first time... I felt a
  sense of...

* Too colorful... and too bright for
  my tastes.

* It's split into channels... each
  with a different theme.

* Their similarities come from...
  the ones in charge.
* A joke of... a crew and ruler.

* Do not ask about her or I'll make
  you leave...
* In many more pieces than one.

* Words cannot describe... my
  disgust for them.

* They think... they're better than
  us.
* While we are... a crime syndicate.

* The differences... between the
  Midnight and Cathodes?

* They're just as rotten as us... or
  even worse.

* They just hide it... behind a mask
  of law.

* Show them... what the Midnight is
  truly capable of.

* We're still going to keep Mike...
  as a mascot.

* Buy a drink first...
  then we'll talk.

  the likes of you.

  around here... are
  you?
